amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 115-783 to mandate that the Secretary of the Interior produce a report to Congress on the potential impact of the lethal taking of California Sea Lions on the recovery of Salmonid stocks.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Vargas amendment (A002) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Vargas amendment (A002) modified by unanimous consent.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Vargas.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Vargas amendment (A002) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
